Wherever possible, supplement plan suggestions, agreements and disagreements with reasons, and try to refer to or build upon your teammates' ideas. I will support you in the process.

column6: Welcome, skye
considering the energy budget, are any of the options aside from plan 1 even a possibility?
I agree, plan 1 is the only one they can do due to budget requirements
it's not exactly carbon neutral.. the least of the 4. but if the budget is non-negotiable, I think it is the only option.
Hey memee, which of the plans seems to be the best from your perspective of environmental friendliness and reliability ?
I'm not sure there would be less toxic waste with plan 1
Plan 2 is definitely the best option. Over budget, but that cost can be recouped over time.
I like plan 2
Agree greensea

column6: would wind energy be reliable enough?
I really believe that it would.
which should we write for the proposal then? 2?
I heard about a European country recently (name escapes me, sorry) that was on wind and produced so much energy that it was actually *paying* customers over one weekend!
wouldn't that depend on wind in the particular area though?
We should go with plan 2, just asking questions.
Yes, too bad we can't advise on solar
It would, I think, but city specs said "windy"
i thought that was for a different city
